item.title: Structure from Motion in Python
item.description: This post summarizes my experience in building a Structure from Motion (SfM) module in Python. Over the course, this post will go through some of the mathematical underpinnings behind SfM as well as the programming constructs in Python leveraged to accomplish various tasks in the module. You can clone the source code for this tutorial and follow the instructions in the readme to run the code. Preliminaries Structure from motion is a technique to perceive depth by utilizing movement.
